message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a method for regularizing neural networks using stochastically trained ensemble layers. This falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) as it involves training neural networks. The experiments conducted in the paper are focused on image classification tasks (cs.CV). The method involves stochastic regularization (cs.NE) and can be seen as a form of data augmentation, which is a common technique in computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also discusses the interpretation of dropout and similar methods, which is related to the field of explainable AI (cs.AI). Finally, the paper involves natural language processing tasks such as sentiment analysis (cs.CL), which suggests that the method may have broader applications beyond computer vision.
